title: New: The 1975 – Sex
body: So they’ve gone through more bands names than **[Viva Brother](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/15943-news-viva-brother-call-it-a-day/)** and **[Coasts](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12660-introducing-coasts/)** combined, which is saying something, yet thankfully **The 1975** (formerly known as Drive Like I Do, [T H E B I G S L E E P](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7653-single-of-the-week-b-i-g-s-l-e-e-p-sex/), The Slowdown etc. etc.) have the tunes to make it not appear quite as annoying. With the release of their [fantastic debut EP](https://soundcloud.com/the1975/sets/the-1975-facedown-ep-1) earlier this year, they’re now readying what will surely be their ‘breakthrough’ single; the gritty, infectious and downright adorably sleazy Sex. With it’s **Pulp** style lyricism – “_I’m not trying to stop you love, if we’re gonna do anything we might as well just fuck_“, and mid-00s indie guitar lines, **The 1975** may well just be the next big thing, that’s if they can hold onto a name for long enough.
